If you will believe the message that I bear you, you will see your danger. You can then put on the gospel shoes, and walk in the pathway of truth, following the true Shepherd, who knows His sheep by name, and calls them to follow Him.--Letter 230, 1903, pp. 2, 4, 5. (To Dr. E. J. Waggoner, October 2, 1903.) 

Released September 23, 1976.
